text: Isn't this place need any review or something ?? This is my personal favourite place for vada pav. Especially Butter vada pav. Taste of this place never changed. They use only Amul butter and make vada pav with a lot of butter. Must visit.
author: Henil Patel

text: I had ordered from here. The vadapav had oil DRIPPING from it. And had ordered the veg aaloo mutter sandwich and puff,the stuffing of sandwich STANK. Puff had so less filling,it was like eating a khari.
author: Iteeshree Modi

text: Before sometimes we have ordered vadapav and it was awesome. Specially I have mentioned spicy and they made it. Perfect taste super spicy loved it. Puff is also good though we couldn't able to click pic because of hunger. Definitely recommend
author: Kosha

text: This small outlet is about memories... During office break, we used to eat a lot and quite frequently. Taste was good and service was quicker.
author: Archi

text: One Of The Best Place For Having Vadapav, And Yes Sandwich was also So Nice... I'm Eating Vadapav of This Place Since 2 Years... Awesome Quality and Taste is Just Amazing
author: Bhuvan Thakkar

text: nice, but i ordered and selected JAIN PREPARATION, but i was provided regular vadapav
author: Harsh Mehta

text: cheecheese vada pav with out cheese
author: Dhaval Sudra

text: Ahmedabad's best vadapav is found here!
author: Akul Chadha

text: very good on taste like always but very very oily like everytime
author: Vikrant Seth

text: Ordered butter vadapav and they delivered oil vadapav.
author: Savan Barot

text: it was poorly made n didn't taste like one which is served at place
author: Raj Thakkar

text: One of the beat vadapav I ever had in my life. Specially its butter vadapav and butter masala pav. A lottt of butter in it. Just amazing.... People follow diet food pls ignore..😂😂😂😂
author: Paras Patel

text: The vadapav was bland. It had no flavour of spice to it.
author: Disha Bhojwani

text: worst pizza ever... I don't like this pizza. pls improve the quality & quantity
author: Vibhuti Bhatt

text: I asked for their chutneys to be packed separately but I ended up getting none. While you eat at the place they have a specific mint and pumpkin chutneys that comes with the vadapau. I got none.

text: THE BUTTER WAS DELICIOUS!!! WELL DONE!😍😍
author: The IntroDog

text: Good taste and value for money.Preserve this quality of vadapav.Nowadays quality of vadapavs is decreasing...Shreeji is best in Vadapavs
author: Priti Mehta

text: Today the sandwiches were over grilled and it seems that the filling was not freshly prepared. Not liked them today.
author: SUYASH AGARWAL

text: You should work on packaging the food !

text: did not get a green chutney which are required in an vadapav as well as delivery are not on time so the vadapav get cold.

text: Ordered twice then too received the food uncovered after we shared the same to the zomatoo delivery executive he said packing doesn't come under his job profile worst service support
author: Aravind Yesodharan

text: very spicy not a bombay style....poor quality
author: Yesha Thakkar

text: Actual ahmedabdi taste of vadapav dey serve Quality 3/5 Taste 4/5 Ambiance 1/5(fast-food shop only no dining) Cleanliess 1/5 (need to be place clean staff also have to be clean)
author: Raj Shah

text: I shall regularly order with Zomato if this is the Quality. Was upto the mark.
author: Bin Jhadu

text: One of the best vadapau in town. Try butter vadapau. It's amazing Service 5/5 Teste 5/5 Cleanness 2.5/5 P.S- Needs improvement for cleanness of shop.
author: Jaisheel Chhatrawala

text: The food was upto the mark.Shreejikrupa dint disappoint as usual.
author: D.s. Ojha

text: Ordered vada pav and it was good as usual..... Quality was good as expected btt the food was nt on time... Bit late which can be improved... Btt overall it was nice.... Happy ordering in zomato.. Thanks 👍👍😉
author: Om Jain

text: had pieces of paper inside pizza. I have images of same and was about to complaint to provider.
author: Urjasachinshah

text: Loved the vadapav. The sandwich was good and the pizza was okayish. I got the butter vadapav and it was heavenly. I used to have it a long time back and it still tastes fantastic.
author: Tushar Goel

text: Extraordinary vadapavs...BEST VADAPAV IN AHMEDABAD...MUST TRY...I AM A REGULAR CUSTOMER AND I LOVE IT.I DONT KNOW WHY ZOMATO DIDNT REVIEW IT EARLIER...
author: Niral Shah
